scripts.build:cpp: emcc --bind -sEXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="_malloc","_free" -sMODULARIZE --extern-post-js msdfgen/post.js -o lib/msdfgen.js msdfgen/wasm.cpp msdfgen/src/core/Shape.cpp msdfgen/src/core/EdgeHolder.cpp msdfgen/src/core/Projection.cpp msdfgen/src/core/DistanceMapping.cpp msdfgen/src/core/msdfgen.cpp msdfgen/src/core/contour-combiners.cpp msdfgen/src/core/edge-selectors.cpp msdfgen/src/core/MSDFErrorCorrection.cpp msdfgen/src/core/Contour.cpp msdfgen/src/core/msdf-error-correction.cpp msdfgen/src/core/equation-solver.cpp msdfgen/src/core/edge-coloring.cpp msdfgen/src/core/edge-segments.cpp
